About Us

Shaping tomorrow's semiconductor innovators with hands-on learning and real outcomes

About Silicon Craft

Silicon Craft, a distinguished division of Silicic Innova Technologies, is a premier institute in VLSI and Embedded Systems education. Our flagship VLSI Design and Verification course, a cornerstone in semiconductor design, now includes Embedded Systems, encompassing vital areas like Embedded System Design, Device Driver Development, and Embedded AI.

Amid India's booming semiconductor job market, Silicon Craft sets itself apart through its commitment to excellence. Unlike conventional centers, we provide in-depth training in VLSI and Embedded Systems, offering hands-on project experience in cutting-edge technologies.

Our mission is to bridge the academia-industry gap, ensuring candidates are job-ready for the competitive VLSI and Embedded Systems sectors. Silicon Craft, the preferred choice for those aspiring to excel in semiconductor design and embedded technologies, stands out with a holistic training approach and dedication to staying at the forefront of industry trends.

VLSI Excellence

Our Mission

Revolutionizing VLSI and Embedded system design education by fostering industry collaborations, mentorship, and real-world projects, empowering students to excel in semiconductor innovation.

Our Vision

Empowering industry-ready electronics graduates, pioneering innovation in semiconductor design to be India's most trusted semiconductor training institute, shaping job-ready innovators and leaders.
